about_the_game:
《BLACK MYTH SHIKONG》It is a 2D platform action adventure game that combines magic and science fiction. The fast-paced battles, combined with unique apocalyptic landscapes, depict a unique world.。

story


Erosion erupted, and people retreated to the dome. Following the protagonist's footsteps, she will embark on a difficult journey to unravel the mystery of erosion.

feature

Attack and bloodsucking, combined with traditional 2D platform action games such as aerial sprints and double jumps, interweave to create a fast-paced platform battle.

A tense and thrilling boss battle
Be prepared to face dangerous erosive creatures and powerful magical creatures. Challenge these terrifying enemies with all your tools and skills.

World settings:

Aerial magic and modern civilization world setting! Combining magical elements with modern civilization to create a brand new world!

World exploration:

Explore the world of Black Myth, where each region has unique environmental buildings and interconnected transportation arteries. There are secrets and treasures hidden in the levels waiting for players to excavate and explore. But at the same time, the road is also full of traps and enemies, and in order to obtain rewards, one must venture into danger.

Npc and regional tasks:

On the journey, interact with different NPCs to receive side quests and upgrade equipment. In this world full of threats, making good use of all resources and props will be an important key to defeating bosses. In addition, completing side quests not only provides generous rewards, but also greatly benefits the plot progression.

Japanese manga hand drawn and 3D combined style:

There are many exquisite hand drawn characters, animations, and comics in the game. During production, we borrowed many Japanese animations and comics and cited many exquisite models, hoping to use a large number of exquisite models to showcase the visual characteristics of this game. The team spent a great deal of effort trying to construct stunning visuals in various details.

short_description: 《BLACK MYTH SHIKONG》is an action game similar to the Galactic Castlevania.Players will take on the role of a somewhat mediocre and decadent young girl, battling the Devourer in a vast world that combines magic and modern civilization.
